channel.title: Pop Music Videos
channel.description:
Hey!
i am not talking about any justin beiber songs those are the terrible side of pop. i am talking about songs by
Kesha Sara Barellies Mckee
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QUQsqBqxoR4[/youtube] I love this video its uplifting. Does this remind you of your mon the dancing randomly and all that lol?
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Uh6VZF0R5U[/youtube] this video is cute... kinda trashy but good overall
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=edP0L6LQzZE[/youtube] if i didn't put kesha on the top of my list.... who did you expect justin beiber? HAH nty k
tell me what pop songs you like by any artist.. parody's do not count. Comment away.

item.title: Pop Music Videos
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

D3i7y:

i am not talking about any justin beiber songs those are the terrible side of pop.

And to you, Ke$ha and most other pop stars aren’t part of the terrible side? Their music might be catchy, but there is little musical talent involved in producing mediocre and non-intellectual music. There aren’t many pop stars nowadays who can even hit the correct pitches 50% of the time.

I’m not saying pop music is terrible; I’d be down to party to some shitty Ke$ha and LMFAO.

Read full topic

item.title: Pop Music Videos
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Pulling off a good scream is actually harder than the singing itself. Proved by a pop singer who used to be a metal singer. Listen to a few tracks from Punk goes Pop, they have better voices than most people.

Read full topic

They do a better job than the originals.[/quote]

pretty cool video expect for the screaming part. Take out the screaming keep the guitar. Awesome video.

item.title: Pop Music Videos
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Oh Lord… I know this thread is going to get it.

I don’t like Kesha, and I don’t know who the rest are. I suppose the only people I used to listen to was Shakira, grew up with listening to most Hispanic music mixed with American - she was the top artist I used to listen to.
